QuestData.Title: The Voice of Lo'Gosh
QuestData.Description: Have you heard of Lo'Gosh, the wolf ancient? In the Alliance tongue, he is known as "Goldrinn."$B$BI don't need to tell you how important the wolf god has been to the Horde - his tenacity under adversity has been an inspiration to all of our disparate races.$B$BSouthwest of here, down in the valley, lies a shrine to Goldrinn. My friend Takrik Ragehowl was refurbishing the shrine when I stopped hearing from him. I fear the worst.$B$BPlease find Takrik and make sure the shrine is okay!
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Takrik Ragehowl near the Shrine of Goldrinn in Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Locate Takrik Ragehowl near the Shrine of Goldrinn in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: Lok'tar, $c! Don't worry about this cage - these animals will come to fear me before long.$B$BMy first priority is to clear this filth away from my beloved shrine.
